data.description: Compact handling of command line options
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is based on Getopt::Long, so logically belongs under
    Getopt::. I think this module is more compact to use than most of
    the other Getopt:: alternatives, with the possible exception of
    ::Mixed. I prefer the OO interface of ::Compact. ::Compact also
    generates a usage summary (with -h, --help, or on parse errors)
    which is quite handy.
